page.title: 11Religion:Invermoriston.
page.content: The Church of Scotland is the main one in Glenmoriston.The present church was built by a member of the family of Grant of Glenmoriston in 1913.It sits above the road to Skye overlooking the River Moriston. in 1981 the congregation was linked with that of Glenurquhart under the present minister Rev.Bart Buell,an American married to a Scotswoman.Both served many years as missionaries in Japan.THe Free Church of scotland now worship in Fort Augustus led by their DRumnadrochit based minister,Rev.Allan Roman Catholics have their services in the village hall once a month. Saint Columba who brought Christianity to Scotland in the 6th century AD is closely associated with the village.The site of his church is marked and close by is St. Columba's Well known for its curative properties
